metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4907 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in share/pnp/application/views/kohana_error_page.php in PNP4Nagios before 0.6.22 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a parameter that is not properly handled in an error message.

criterions.comment: pnp4nagios: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
